pw_minlen: Password must be at least 8 characters
chat_choose_slot: Please select a time to book:
chat_input_placeholder: Type your thoughts and feelings here...
chat_error_generic: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.
chat_privacy_notice: Your conversations are private and secure
chat_intro_subtitle: Nice to meet you! I'm an AI buddy who can grow and remember～
chat_intro_power_memory: Super Memory: I remember everything we've talked about
chat_intro_power_personality: Personality Adaptation: I learn your communication style to become more like your friend
chat_intro_power_interests: Interest Recording: As I get to know you better, I remember your hobbies and thoughts
chat_intro_power_online: Always Online: No matter when you come back, I remember who you are
chat_intro_closing: Here, you can chat freely, share thoughts, and don't worry about anything～ Let's start being friends! 😊
booking_instructions: Choose a time slot and click “Book” to confirm your appointment
booking_try_later_or_contact: Please try again later or contact the therapist
sched_header_subtitle: Manage your availability, bookings, and timezone preferences
sched_timezone_hint: Clients will view times in their local timezone
sched_upcoming_desc: Stay ready for your next sessions at a glance
sched_no_upcoming_desc: Add availability so clients can reserve your time
sched_calendar_desc: Switch views or use ← → to browse weeks, N to jump back
sched_add_availability_panel_desc: Set preferred slots, duration, and repeats
sched_repeat_weekly_hint: Choose the weekdays to repeat for the next few weeks
sched_my_availability_desc: Manage active time slots; booked slots are shown but cannot be deleted
sched_cancel_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?
sched_edit_availability_desc: Modify the start and end time for this slot
sched_delete_availability_desc: Are you sure you want to delete the availability slot at {{range}}?
sched_no_availability_desc: Create slots so clients can schedule with you
sched_error_fetch_availability: Failed to load availability, please try again
sched_error_fetch_bookings: Failed to load bookings, please try again
sched_add_failure_desc: Something went wrong while adding availability. Please retry.
sched_form_invalid_desc: Please review start time, end time, and duration.
sched_future_time: Start time must be in the future
sched_future_time_desc: Adjust the start time so it is later than the current moment.
sched_conflict_booking_desc: {{range}} is already booked. Pick a different time.
sched_merge_failure_desc: We couldn't merge those slots. Try again later.
sched_delete_success_desc: The selected time slot has been removed.
sched_delete_failure_desc: We couldn't delete that slot. Please try again.
sched_merge_dialog_desc: Existing availability overlaps {{range}}. Merge into one continuous slot?
err_create_profile: Failed to create user profile, please try again
err_update_timezone: Failed to update timezone, please try again

tests.title: Mental Health Assessments
tests.subtitle: Take a standardized assessment to track your mental health over time.

phq9.title: PHQ-9 Depression
phq9.description: Patient Health Questionnaire for depression screening

tests.noPreviousAssessments: No previous assessments found. Complete more assessments to see your trend.
tests.disclaimer: This is a screening tool, not a diagnosis. Please consult with a mental health professional to discuss your results and treatment options.
tests.note: These assessments are screening tools, not diagnostic instruments. Results should be discussed with a qualified mental health professional.

bookings.noSlots: No available slots on this day.
bookings.conflict: This slot was just taken. Please pick another slot.
bookings.selectDateAndSlot: Select a date and available time slot
